relatedanime.anime: Owari no Seraph: Nagoya Kessen Hen

anime.description: A mysterious vampire named http://anidb.net/ch83613 [Shahar] kidnaps a human girl named http://anidb.net/ch83614 [Riko]. Shahar`s true goal is unknown, and while he`s kidnapped Riko, he refuses to drink her blood. Suddenly, he receives a visit from the vampire nobles http://anidb.net/ch71716 [Ferid] and http://anidb.net/ch73467 [Crowley]. Meanwhile, http://anidb.net/ch70945 [Guren] tasks http://anidb.net/ch71717 [Shinoa]`s squad with rescuing Riko and returning her to her family. Source: ANN Note: Bundled with a limited edition of the manga`s 11th volume.

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

character.name: Ichinose Guren
character.description: Guren is Lieutenant Colonel of the "The Moon Demon Company", Vampire Extermination Unit of the Japanese Imperial Demon Army. He has led Yuuichiro to join the Japanese Imperial Demon Army after he escaped the city of vampire. He is secretly attempting something to reform the Imperial Demon Army governed by the Hiiragi Family. Source: Official Page

character.name: Hyakuya Mikaela
character.description: Mikaela is the 2nd remaining survivor of the Hyakuya Orphanage, and best friend of Yuuichiro. He was thought to have died when escaping from the city of vampire, but was alive and turned into a vampire. He fights to rescue Yuuichiro who is been used by humans. Source: Official Page

character.name: Hyakuya Yuuichirou
character.description: Hyakuya Yuuichirou is a boy who escaped from the vampire city. He holds intense hatred against the vampires who killed his family, and enlisted in the Japanese Imperial Demon Army for vampire extermination. He is not always a good team player, but deep inside he is kind and caring. Source: Official Website

character.name: Ferid Bathory
character.description: Ferid Bathory is the man who killed http://anidb.net/ch70947 [Hyakuya Yuuichirou]`s family when they tried to escape the vampire city. As a Seventh Progenitor vampire, he has much power, but he often speaks nonsense. He seems to be plotting something with the humans behind everyone`s back. Source: Official Website

character.name: Hiiragi Shinoa
character.description: Shinoa is the Squad Leader of "The Moon Demon Company". Her origin is Hiiragi Family who takes control of the Japanese Imperial Demon Army, and is the real sister of Hiiragi Mahiru who developed the Cursed Gear. Is a subordinate of Lieutenant Colonel Guren, and was appointed to supervise Hyakuya Yuuichiro. Source: Official Page

character.name: Sanguu Mitsuba
character.description: Mitusuba is an elite who belongs to the Vampire Extermination Unit since 13 years old. Has known Shinoa for a long time. She thinks that she let a member die because of her selfishness, and since then focuses on teamwork during battle. Source: Official Page

character.name: Kimizuki Shihou
character.description: Kimizuki Shihou is http://anidb.net/ch70947 [Hyakuya Yuuichirou]`s brother-in-arms in the Moon Demon Company. He is clear-headed and has excellent combat ability, but is cynical and gets treated as a troublemaker. He has a http://anidb.net/ch76397 [bedridden sister], and enlisted in the army in order to allow her to undergo the treatment. Source: Official Website

character.name: Saotome Yoichi
character.description: Yoichi is a member of the "The Moon Demon Company" fighting vampires with Yuuichiro. His sister has been killed by a vampire, and joined the troop for revenge. Although he is kind-hearted, he has a strong will and stand up against difficulty at times of emergency. Source: Official Page

character.name: Crowley Eusford
character.description: Crowley is a noble of the Thirteenth Progenitor and belongs to the faction led by Ferid Bathory. He participated in the battle for Shinjuku, and at the battle with Shinoa`s squad, showed his overpowering ability which even beat down Yuuichirou with the Black Demon gear!! Source: Official Page

character.name: Goshi Norito
character.description: Norito is a Colonel of the Japanese Imperial Demon Army, and serves as a member of a team led by Guren. He excels in illusion than physical attacks, and covers Guren who mainly fights in close combat. He is sensual and loves beautiful women. Source: Official Page

character.name: Juujou Mito
character.description: Mito is the daughter of the prestigious Juujou family and a member of Guren`s Moon Demon Company squad. She is a Colonel with a characteristic crimson-red hair. Mito excels in spellcast techniques transmitted from generation to generation in the Juujou family, which enhances her physical ability in the combat. Source: Official Page

character.name: Hanayori Sayuri
character.description: Sayuri is a servant for the Ichinoses, and is Second Lieutenant of the Japanese Imperial Demon Army. Since young, she had a crush on Guren and is his emotional support. While serving as a member of The Moon Demon Company, she is also an Army instructor for the training classes. Source: Official Page

character.name: Yukimi Shigure
character.description: Shigure is a Second Lieutenant of the Japanese Imperial Demon Army, and like Sayuri, she is a servant for the Ichinose Family. Her personality is calm and tends to hide her emotions. She is keeping her feelings for Guren to herself. Shigure has incredible battle skills and uses weapons such as hidden weapons with dexterity. Source: Official Page

character.name: Shahar
character.description: Shahar was originally a human who became a vampire, like http://anidb.net/ch70946 [Mikaela Hyakuya]. However, he feels extreme guilt towards his dead sister, Lana, and events during his life as a human may have contributed him to becoming insane and thinking http://anidb.net/ch83614 [Riko] is his dead sister. He kidnaps Riko and becomes a wanted criminal chased by both http://anidb.net/ch71717 [Shinoa]`s squad and vampire city guards. Source: Owari no Seraph Wiki

character.name: Riko
character.description: Riko is a human girl who was kidnapped by http://anidb.net/ch83613 [Shahar]. While initially scared of him, she eventually becomes caring and sympathetic towards him even though he kidnapped her. Source: Owari no Seraph Wiki
